Metadata: Restoration: A Newsletter about Salmon, Coastal Watersheds, and People (No. 1, September 1994)
Oregon State University Sea Grant College Program

Through Restoration Newsletter, we want to help coastal residents obtain objective information so they can rise above the turmoil of the day's headlines and make well-informed choices for themselves, their communities, and their future. In this first newsletter issue are the following articles: 1) Watershed health mobilizes agencies and communities, by Tom Gentle; 2) An Endangered Species Act primer, by Richard Hildreth and Jeanne Thompson; 3) Federal agencies focus on key watersheds, by Joseph Cone; 4) Smith River projects address water quality; 5) Diversity: An asset in watershed improvement, by Fielding Cooley.
